title: Request Currently Not Collectible Status
description: A taxpayer with a tax debt is experiencing extreme financial hardship and cannot afford any payments.

tasks.description: Gather detailed financial information from the taxpayer to prove financial hardship.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary income, expense, and asset information.

tasks.description: Contact the IRS to request that the account be placed in Currently Not Collectible (CNC) status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates with the IRS collections department.

tasks.description: Provide the required financial documentation to the IRS to support the CNC request.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits the financial forms, and the IRS agrees to place the account in CNC status.
